title: Learn Something: The Ultimate Guitar Practice Routine [News]
text: UG News editor since early 2013. King Crimson fan. I handle the news around here. Posted 10 hours ago 2 Guitar instructor Tyler Larson from Music Is Win presented another nifty video lesson, showcasing his "ultimate guitar practice routine."The musician noted that the given routine requires around 2 hours per day, dividing it into the following categories:1) Alternate picking - 15 minutes2) Sweep picking - 15 minutes3) Byzantine scale - 15 minutes4) Whole tone scale - 15 minutes5) Sight reading - 15 minutes6) Triad practice - 15 minutes7) Improvising - 30 minutesTyler then proceeded to demonstrate the highlights of his exercises with a variety of examples. Check out the video for actual demonstrations.
